question: Which Ministry has launched a National Migration Support Portal named “ShramShakti”?
option3: Union Ministry of women and child welfare
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Tribal Affairs has launched a dedicated portal that would help in formulation of state and national-level programme for migrant workers.
The portal is named ‘ShramShakti’ and was launched by the Union Tribal Affairs Minister at Goa. He also launched a training manual for the migrant workers named ShramSaathi.
